price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߖߍߣߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲߫ ߥߐߙߐ߲ߥߌ߬ߟߊ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߡߍ߬ ߓߟߋߓߟߋ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul man rabbu al-samāwāti al-sabʿi warabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
